title: Danville records 13th homicide of year Thursday night
content:
A 15-year-old was fatally shot Thursday evening.
Sean Antwan Clayborne, of Danville, was found dead in an area behind the former Highlander’s Restaurant, Lodge and Pub in the 100 block of Piney Forest Road, according to police.
Thank you for reading!
